Name: Royal College of Nursing, Australia, Archives

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only; closed weekends, public holidays and annual closure. No reference service available. No copying service available.

About.Access: Subject to approval of the Executive Director. Minimum of 2 weeks' advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: The College has resolved to collect its own records only.

About.Major holdings: Royal College of Nursing, Australia: Minute books Education Committee 1950s (c1m); Council minute books and other committees 1949- (3m). Pat Slater, Royal College of Nursing, Australia: Personal papers 1950s-1990s (8m).
